class.name: pandora_geotiff_plugins/MapWriter
class.description: This is a Map plugin that draws the map.

class.name: pandora_geotiff_plugins/CoverageWriter
class.description: This is a Coverage plugin that draws the coverage.

class.name: pandora_geotiff_plugins/PathWriter
class.description: This is a Path plugin that draws the path the robot walked into.

class.name: pandora_geotiff_plugins/ObjectsWriter
class.description: This is an Object plugin that draws the objects the robot has found.
